thread.title: Foreign toll in Saudi hajj stampede - Region - World
thread.title_full: Foreign toll in Saudi hajj stampede - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Foreign toll in Saudi hajj stampede - Region - World
text:
Related Egyptian fatalities in Mecca stampede rises to 124 Hundreds still missing a week after deadly hajj stampede Iran nearly doubles its death toll from hajj stampede Saudi authorities have yet to provide a breakdown of the nationalities of the 769 Muslim pilgrims they say were killed in the hajj stampede, but a number of countries have announced the deaths of their citizens.
The death toll given below by foreign officials and media is now 1,030, well in excess of the Saudi figure. The tallies also show another 614 people as unaccounted for:
- Iran: 464 dead
- Egypt: 124 dead, 70 missing
- Indonesia: 91 dead
- Nigeria: 64 dead, 244 missing
- Mali: 60 dead
- India: 51 dead, 63 missing
- Pakistan: 46 dead, more than 40 missing
- Niger: 22 dead
- Cameroon: 20 dead
- Ivory Coast: 14 dead, 77 missing
- Algeria: 14 dead, 54 missing
- Chad: 11 dead
- Senegal: 10 dead
- Morocco: 10 dead, 29 missing
- Somalia: 8 dead (media reports)
- Ghana: 5 dead, 21 missing
- Libya: 4 dead, 16 missing
- Tanzania: 4 dead
- Kenya: 3 dead
- Tunisia: 2 dead
- Burkina Faso: 1 dead
- Burundi: 1 dead
- Netherlands: 1 dead
- Benin: unspecified number of deaths
